item.title: 帮助埃隆-马斯克建造德克萨斯州 Gigafactory 工厂的无证工人
item.description:
特斯拉和SpaceX都依赖于他们的劳动力，而马斯克则主张打击边境。【原文：

Tesla and SpaceX both relied on their labor while Musk advocated for a border crackdown.

】

item.title: 欧洲议员敦促因刚果战争冻结对卢旺达的援助
item.description: 欧盟立法者呼吁停止对卢旺达的财政援助，因为卢旺达支持邻国刚果民主共和国的 M23 叛乱运动。【原文：European Union lawmakers called for a halt to financial assistance for Rwanda because of its support for the M23 rebel insurgency in neighboring Democratic Republic of Congo.】

item.title: 华尔街 2025 年迄今为止的主要趋势
item.description: 今年还早，但华尔街本周的动向表明，有几个重要趋势值得关注。【原文：The year is still young, but moves on Wall Street this week point to a couple of important trends to keep an eye on.】

item.title: 英镑攀升至 2025 年高点，开年表现在同类货币中最差
item.description: 英镑兑美元汇率攀升至今年最高水平，原因是交易商回补了在 1 月份大跌期间建立的空头头寸。【原文：The pound climbed to its highest level this year against the dollar as traders covered short positions built up during a selloff in January.】

item.title: 请停止邀请人工智能记录员参加会议
item.description:
使用人工智能进行会议总结引发了有关礼仪、隐私和会议目的的问题。【原文：

Using artificial intelligence to summarize meetings raises questions around etiquette, privacy and the purpose of meeting in the first place. 

】

item.title: KKR 为房地产信贷基金融资逾 8.5 亿美元
item.description: KKR & Co.为机会型房地产信贷基金募集了超过 8.5 亿美元的资金，因为投资者看到了房地产交易融资的成熟时机。【原文：KKR & Co. raised more than $850 million for an opportunistic real estate credit fund as investors see a ripening moment for financing property deals.】

item.title: 俄罗斯银行将利率维持在通胀斗争中的历史最高水平
item.description: 俄罗斯央行在第二次会议上将借贷成本维持在了历史最高水平，但对在下次会议上收紧货币政策以应对持续通胀的前景持开放态度。【原文：Russia’s central bank kept borrowing costs at a record high for the second meeting, though held open the prospect it could tighten monetary policy at its next meeting to fight persistent inflation.】

item.title: 本周美国通胀恐慌之后，债券交易员保持警惕
item.description: 在经历了动荡的一周之后，美国国债周五趋于稳定，交易员们面对的现实是，再次降息可能要等很长时间。【原文：US Treasuries stabilized on Friday after a turbulent week that saw traders confronted by the reality another interest-rate cut could be a long time coming.】

item.title: 特斯拉跌势买家在看跌信号中面临险境
item.description: 在不到两个月的时间里，特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc.然而，对于打算入股这家电动汽车制造商的投资者来说，华尔街有一条信息：买家要小心。【原文：Tesla Inc. has shed about a quarter of its value in less than two months, amounting to some $400 billion. Yet for investors thinking about diving into the electric-vehicle maker’s shares, Wall Street has a message: buyer beware.】

item.title: 1,680 亿美元外资流出，中国外资流出创历史新高
item.description: 去年，中国的外商直接投资流出量创下历史新高，在与美国重启贸易战之后，这种外流可能会持续下去。【原文：China saw record outflows of foreign direct investment last year, an exodus that threatens to persist after the resumption of a trade war with the US.】

item.title: 安联国际在十年大跌中押注土耳其里拉债券
item.description: 安联全球投资公司（Allianz Global Investors）坚持押注土耳其期限最长的地方债务，这使其成为以十年来最快速度抛售里拉债券的外国投资者中的异类。【原文：Allianz Global Investors is sticking with its bet on Turkey’s longest-maturity local debt, making it an outlier among foreign investors who’ve unloaded lira bonds at the fastest pace in a decade.】

item.title: 阿联酋 Adnoc 钻井公司打算借款 10 亿美元以推动发展
item.description: 阿拉伯联合酋长国最大的石油生产商 Adnoc Drilling Co. 首席财务官 Youssef Salem 表示，该公司计划今年向银行申请约 10 亿美元的融资，以便该公司能够展期即将到期的借款，并为投资和分红提供资金。【原文：Adnoc Drilling Co. plans to tap banks for about $1 billion in financing this year so the unit of the United Arab Emirates’ biggest oil producer can roll over expiring borrowings, and fund investment and dividends, Chief Financial Officer Youssef Salem said.】

item.title: 独角兽繁荣期已过，初创企业开始绝望
item.description:
价值数十亿美元的初创企业泡沫正在破灭，超过 1 万亿美元的价值被前景黯淡的公司锁定。【原文：

The billion-dollar startup bubble is deflating, and more than $1 trillion in value is locked up in companies with dwindling prospects.

】

item.title: 贸易战考验米莱的特朗普优先外交政策
item.description: 阿根廷总统哈维尔-米莱伊（Javier Milei）在其总统任期内一直在向唐纳德-特朗普示好。迄今为止，这并没有让他的国家远离美国领导人全球贸易战的前线。【原文：Argentina’s Javier Milei has spent his presidency cozying up to Donald Trump. So far, it hasn’t kept his nation off the front lines of the US leader’s global trade war.】

item.title: 欧元区经济终将在 2024 年底实现增长
item.description: 欧元区统计局（Eurostat）上调了最初的估计，欧元区经济在去年年底终究还是实现了增长。【原文：The euro-area economy managed to eke out growth at the end of last year after all, with Eurostat revising up its initial estimate.】

item.title: Cheyne Capital 对冲基金押注阿联酋作为抵御特朗普的缓冲器
item.description: Cheyne Capital 的欧洲、中东和非洲对冲基金加倍看好阿拉伯联合酋长国的股票市场，称该国最有能力抵御美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的政策所带来的动荡。【原文：Cheyne Capital’s hedge fund for Europe, the Middle East and Africa is doubling down on the United Arab Emirates as its favored equity market, saying the nation is best placed to weather turmoil stemming from US President Donald Trump’s policies.】

item.title: 欧盟称特朗普互惠关税计划方向错误
item.description: 欧盟委员会主席乌苏拉-冯德莱恩（Ursula von der Leyen）表示，如果唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）兑现其征收全球互惠关税的威胁，欧盟将作出回应，称这是 "朝着错误方向迈出的一步"。【原文：European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen said the bloc will respond if Donald Trump follows through on his threat to impose global reciprocal tariffs, calling them a “step in the wrong direction.”】

item.title: 欧洲股市反弹显示对乌克兰和平过于自信
item.description: 由于投资者对乌克兰可能实现的停火过于乐观，欧股涨势过热并将暂停。【原文：The European stock rally is overheating and is due for a pause as investors have gotten overly optimistic about a potential ceasefire in Ukraine.】

item.title: 非洲联盟创建评级机构以消除偏见、释放资金
item.description: 非洲推出了自己的信用评级公司，以消除人们对全球机构的评估对非洲大陆存在代价高昂的偏见的担忧。【原文：Africa unveiled its own credit rating company to address concerns that evaluations by global agencies carry a costly bias against the continent.】

item.title: 意大利计划由国家支持的意大利电信交易以终止 CVC、Iliad 的交易
item.description: 在包括 CVC Capital Partners Plc 和法国的 Iliad SA 在内的国际投资者围绕着电话运营商意大利电信公司（Telecom Italia SpA）转来转去时，意大利正在寻求国内的替代方案。【原文：Italy is pushing for a domestic alternative to international investors including CVC Capital Partners Plc and France’s Iliad SA circling around phone carrier Telecom Italia SpA.】

item.title: 法国马克龙称欧盟赤字规则已过时
item.description: 法国总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙在接受《金融时报》采访时说，在欧盟需要投资国防和数字化转型之际，欧盟的财政规则已经 "过时"。【原文：The European Union’s fiscal rules are “obsolete” at a time when it needs to invest in defense and the digital transition, French President Emmanuel Macron said in an interview with the Financial Times.】

item.title: 美国银行策略师哈特内特称通胀将迫使特朗普在关税问题上出手
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp）的策略师表示，美国通胀加快可能最终会成为金融市场的好消息，因为这将迫使唐纳德-特朗普总统选择降低贸易关税。【原文：Faster inflation in the US could end up being good news for financial markets because it will force President Donald Trump to opt for smaller trade tariffs, according to strategists at Bank of America Corp.】

item.title: 英国法院称对冲基金 Altana 滥用合资伙伴的商业机密
item.description: 根据伦敦一家法院的裁决，对冲基金 Altana Wealth Ltd. 从与一家投资公司的合资交易中获取了商业机密，并将其滥用于建立自己的利润丰厚的基金。【原文：Hedge fund Altana Wealth Ltd. took trade secrets from a soured joint venture deal with an investment firm and misused them to set up its own lucrative fund, according to a London court ruling.】

item.title: 中国 1 月份信贷扩张因贷款增加而加快
item.description: 得益于银行的季节性放贷和政府债券的强劲销售，中国 1 月份的信贷扩张速度比去年同期有所加快。【原文：China’s credit expansion picked up more than expected in January from a year ago, thanks to banks’ seasonal lending push and strong sales of government bonds.】

item.title: 这就是人们如此钟爱黄金的原因
item.description:
闪闪发光的黄色金属是什么？【原文：

What is it about the shiny yellow metal?

】

item.title: 奇货可居：这就是为什么人们如此钟情于黄金 (播客)
item.description: 黄金价格基本上创下了历史新高。但黄金究竟有什么魅力让人们如此钟爱？为什么人们总是对一种没有实际工业用途的金属情有独钟？拥有或佩戴黄金又代表着什么？在本期播客中，我们采访了位于纽约市钻石区的珠宝店 TraxNYC 的创始人马克苏德-阿加贾尼（Maksud Agadjani）。您可能在电影《Uncut Gems》中认识马克苏德，他在电影中扮演了一个与自己相似的角色，在瞬息万变的贵金属世界中工作。【原文：The price of gold is basically at record highs. But what is it about gold that people love so much? Why have people always craved a metal that has no real industrial uses? And what does owning or wearing gold represent? On this episode of the podcast, we speak with Maksud Agadjani, the founder of TraxNYC, a jewelry store based in NYC’s Diamond District. You may recognize Maksud from the movie Uncut Gems, where he played a character similar to himself, working in the fast-moving world of precious】

item.title: Gigaclear 和贷款人利用债务顾问筹集新资金
item.description: Gigaclear Ltd. 及其贷款人正在聘请顾问，以寻求资金继续在英国各地铺设光纤网络。【原文：Gigaclear Ltd. and its lenders are hiring advisers as the company seeks funding to continue rolling out its fiber network across the UK.】

item.title: 贝恩同意收购 PAI 投资的设施管理公司 Apleona
item.description: 贝恩资本同意从私募股权公司 PAI Partners 手中收购德国设施管理公司 Apleona Group GmbH。【原文：Bain Capital agreed to acquire German facilities management company Apleona Group GmbH from private equity firm PAI Partners.】

item.title: 芬兰提议雷恩连任央行行长
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员奥利-雷恩（Olli Rehn）将连任芬兰中央银行行长，任期七年。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Olli Rehn is set to be appointed for a second seven-year term as the governor of Finland’s central bank.】

item.title: 中国高榕创投向加密独角兽企业投资 3000 万美元
item.description: 高榕创投（Gaorong Ventures）向香港最大的持牌加密货币交易所运营商投资了3000万美元，这是中国风险投资巨头涉足3万亿美元数字资产领域的一个罕见例子。【原文：Gaorong Ventures has invested $30 million in the operator of Hong Kong’s biggest licensed crypto exchange, a rare example of a Chinese venture powerhouse dabbling into the $3 trillion digital asset arena.】
